title: Drawing, "Floral Design", ca. 1930s
description: Centered on a pale red background, in black outline and shaded in black within the outlines, a stylized flower on a leaf-sprouting stem evokes a tulip or lotos. Similar stem-and-leaf images in solid black occupy the four corners in the design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Floral Design", ca. 1930s.
ca. 1930s. China marker; pastel. Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-19.
